function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of evidence-based research on the recommended use of anti-inflammatory drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on expert opinions without sufficient scientific evidence","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of evaluation of impacts of interventions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize health in economic, political, food, and built environment sectors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential compromise of data privacy and individual rights due to extensive tracing using big data and deployment of the police to enforce movement restriction measures","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequitable governance approaches leading to restricted access to safe spaces for physical activity and urban resources for certain communities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential discrimination and harm resulting from the application of lockdown measures in a discriminatory manner","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized fresh food markets leading to movement restrictions and closure impacts","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flaws in urban infrastructure reducing resilience to food insecurity and promoting unsafe physical activity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination in multisectoral responses to pandemics","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to nutritious foods for vulnerable populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk-containment strategies at the community level","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased physical activity in public spaces may lead to greater risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal settlements and urban poor may not have access to safe physical activity options at home","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines on safe physical activity outdoors during a pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift to unhealthy processed food consumption due to lack of nutritional guidelines for food parcels to the poor","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interrupted access to food for children from households that depend on school-feeding programmes due to school closures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggering loss of jobs and livelihoods leading to financial challenges in affording healthy foods","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of routine physical activity due to stay-at-home orders and curfew measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exacerbation of unhealthy food consumption, physical inactivity, and sedentary behavior due to covid-19 control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threatened food supply and increased food insecurity due to covid-19-related closures of national borders","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of nutritional knowledge, cooking skills, and guidelines for ensuring nutritional quality of food parcels to the poor","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contaminated air exhaust outlets leading to deposition of virus-laden droplets on equipment such as vents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Operational limitations during an outbreak leading to inconsistent methodology and small sample size","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited air sampling volume and dilution of airborne sars-cov-2 in the room","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning of environmental surfaces in healthcare facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental contamination with sars-cov-2 in patient rooms and facilities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission for sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Nosocomial transmission of sars-cov-2 due to environmental contamination","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain mode of transmission and extent of environmental contamination","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of specific cleaning chemicals in routine cleaning","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Geographic spread of west nile virus and lyme disease","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effect of climate change on vbds","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Urban and suburban planning and vbd risk","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence and re-emergence of tick-and mosquito-borne diseases in canada due to climate change","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases responding differently to long-term changes in temperature and rainfall patterns","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence and spread of new mosquito-borne and tick-borne pathogens in canada due negative impact on migrant youth in the labor market","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact on immigrants in declining industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant participation gap in training and skills development","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher training needs for immigrants in
